Ecommerce Projects

Ecommerce has been a huge part of my professional development. Here are a few ecommerce projects I've worked on.

Still in progress

Here's a quick overview of what I'll be covering:

  • What I learned building my own online self-help bookstore from scratch at Selfhelpy, including how I found a drop-ship supplier, listed 1,000 titles, and start accepting payments after a few months of hard work.
  • My process for designing and developing the Buy Guns Online landing page at MidwayUSA.
  • My process for designing and developing the FFL Finder Tool at MidwayUSA.
